data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Tingjing, Li, Qiang (2011): Two new species of the genus Pison Jurine (Hymenoptera: Crabronidae) from China, with a key to the Chinese species. Zootaxa 3007: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.208052
